name: 基礎設計（一）
description: 本課程為基礎設計課程，由工作坊形式(workshop)為引導學生藉由草圖、比例模型、基本造型進行設計思考發想(design thinking)、小組討論(group discussion)、動手製作(making)的實體物件與作品發表(presentation)，培養學生了解基本創作思考與設計流程的認識；了解造形形式原理與構成組織方法，以培養造形創作表現的基礎能力。
goals: Cultivate the basic concepts and literacy students need to have in design profession.
Improve students' judgment and aesthetic value in visual observation.
Enable students to have a wide range of relevant knowledge and comprehensive abilities of creating more ideal life by design.
Understand how design can potentially improve human life by incorporating the new technologies for the future.
syllabus:
Basic Design I 

開課系級 設計系1年級   
  
課程簡介  
This course is a fundamental level class structured for the student who plan to pursue a career in design field. Students will experience the design process through developing their own project and facing the difficulty of dealing with real material, form and compositions.    
  
課程目標 

*   Development and understanding of technical skills such as simple drawing, painting and cutting skills needed to render well composed 2-dimensional designs. 
*   Development and understanding of crafting skills such as cutting and gluing, composing 3-dimensional volume, and articulating the possible function.  
*   Develop an outstanding work ethic and the commitment necessary to succeed in achieving the above stated goals and objectives.   
     

教學進度與主題 

This class reinforce for knowledge and skill for pursuing design education through various design projects during the semester. There are three projects for students to explore the different approach to develop their foundation of design. The first assignment is focusing on drawing skill, abstraction process, and model making with training the observation skill of others. The second project is to develop the skill of deconstruction, composition and 2-dimensional drawing skill. The last project is to develop observation skill, abstraction process, and scale and proportion articulation. Students are evaluated through these three projects, attendance to the class, and the end of semester final report.   
 

教學進度與主題 

(1) Portrait to 3D (P1) 

(2) Positive and Negative (P2) 

(3) Point, Line, and Volume (P3)
